message.content:
{"id": "6304", 
"title": "Cannot sync a .java file and another resource", 
"description": "When trying to sync a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.", 
"OB": "1. Open the package viewer. 
2. Select a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file.", 
"EB": "The synchronization between the .java file and the other resource should be successful.", 
"SR": "1. Investigate and fix the issue causing the synchronization failure between the .java file and the other resource. 
2. Verify that the synchronization process works correctly for all file types in the package viewer."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '6304', 'title': 'Bug 6304cannot synch a .java file and another resource', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Bug 6304cannot synch a .java file and another resource 1. select a .java file and another resource (a .properties file, for instance)in the package viewer2. '}
